content:
I'm looking for a submersible water pump for irrigation and livestock watering. My budget is around $500. I'd like a pump that's durable, reliable, and has a good flow rate. As for tools, I need a new set of wrenches, pliers, and screwdrivers. I'm open to suggestions on brands and quality levels, but I'd like to stay within a budget of $200 for the toolset.

By the way, I'm glad I sold those excess roosters to my neighbor. It was a good deal, and I'm looking forward to using the money to invest in my farm.
